meta.title: Scrollspy
meta.description: Automatically activate BootstrapVue navigation or list group components based on scroll position to indicate which link is currently active in the viewport.

arg.description: ID of element to monitor scrolling on (if not provided defaults to the body element)

modifiers.description: Offset (in pixels) from top of scrolling viewport before triggering active state

modifiers.name: offset
modifiers.description: Position calculation method using `offset` procedure (default process for body)

modifiers.name: position
modifiers.description: Position calculation method using the `position` procedure

modifiers.name: auto
modifiers.description: Position calculation method: `auto` will choose `offset` if scroll element is body, else the method is `position`. This is the default.
